      • hasUpgrade

        boolean hasUpgrade(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack me,
                   net.minecraft.item.Item check)
        Checks if the tool has a particular upgrade.
        Parameters:
        me - The ItemStack version of the tool
        check - The item that is being checked against, or the upgrade
        Returns:

      • toolClass
